titleStmt.title: Phármaka ouranóthen, the shadow of the tree of life: Or A discourse of the divine institution and most effectual application of medicinal remedies. In order to the preservation, and restauration of health. / By J.M.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, John, 1648-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wilkins, and are to be sold at his shop in Exchange-Alley, by the Exchange-Coffee-House,

notesStmt.note: First words of title in Greek; mistransliterated in Wing as: Pharmakagranothen.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
